Air Transportation

  • Network:Our network stretches around the world, which makes us the best choice for your cargo needs. If you need airport-to-airport, door-to-door transportation or any combination, we will make the arrangements for you.

Advantages:

  • Fast delivery (usually between 24 and 48 hours)
  • Prompt order fulfillment
  • Reduced supplier lead time
  • Improved service levels

When time is crucial for your cargo, our air transportation is your best option. We always support our clients in organizing any charter flight and cargo shipment requested. We take pride in offering a fast and effective service based on the foundations we have built in the air freight industry. We guarantee the reliability of our service, punctuality, efficiency and caring for the safety of the transported cargo. Our partnerships with service providers and cooperation with the major airlines allows us to offer a service that we pride ourselves on.

Road freight service shortlist

  • Worldwide import
  • Export Consolidation Services
  • Warehouse Pick Up
  • Expediting
  • Vendor Management
  • Export customs clearance in the country of origin
  • Import customs clearance of cargo at the port of discharge
  • Documentation specialists
  • Safe handling of General cargo
  • Perishable cargo shipment
  • Door-to-Door service

ABOUT PORTGATE

Since 1999 PORTGATE carries out all kinds of international cargo transportation mainly in the Caucasus region, Central Asia and the CIS countries. The majority of the transportations are completed through the TRACECA corridor.
